content: the current version is dated 03/04/2014 the pattern includes instructions for 6 sizes to fit ages 3-4 to medium adult sizes included are 24 27 30 33 35 and 40 finished chest measurement includes tips for using cables in keep me warm vests **from the pattern ** ounces of yarn required size 24 27 30 33 35 40 8 oz 10 11 13 16 18 **from the designers ** if using double-stranded worsted rather than bulky yarn you would need 550 yards of worsted weight yarn for the smallest size and 1200 yards of worsted weight yarn for the largest size a fix to even up the knit and purl row for the top of the vest is included in the instructions on page 2
